## ActionDispatcher class

Responsible for providing an action observer of dispatched actions. Primarily used by [EffectsSubscriber](./state-management.effectssubscriber.md) to handle effects.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ActionDispatcher 
```
